text: Pinkard is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *John Henry Pinkard (1865–1934), American businessman, banker and spiritualist or quack doctor *Josh Pinkard (born 1986), American football player *Larry Pinkard (born 1992), American football player *Maceo Pinkard (1897–1962), American composer, lyricist and music publisher *Nichole Pinkard, American computer scientist *Ron Pinkard (born 1941), American actor
title: Pinkard
